description:
Get ready to unleash the adrenaline-fueled fury of raw power on the asphalt! Dominate the tracks as you steer through an array of formidable challenges and opponents. 
   ▪ Thrilling Races: Engage in heart-pounding drag races against formidable opponents, testing your skills to the max.
   ▪ Customise Your Truck: Modify your truck with jet engines, bumpers, and more, gaining a strategic advantage.
   ▪ Conquer Bosses: Rise through ranks, face fierce bosses, and claim your place as drag racing champion.
   ▪ Diverse Tracks: Race on challenging tracks with unique twists, pushing your skills higher.
     It's time to show the world your true potential and cement your legacy as the ultimate drag racing legend! The competition is fierce, the tracks are unforgiving, and the glory is yours for the taking. Will you seize it?
name: Truck Drag Racing Legends Simulator
intro: Crush obstacles, leave rivals behind, and become the ultimate drag racing legend!
